reviews.title: Tangie Russell
reviews.description: JML Law was great to work with. I do not post reviews often but feel it was necessary to post my opinion here. I had a very good experience with JML and felt they represented me very well from start to finish. I felt they were very fair all around. I was in good hands. Good communication and great legal representation. Brought issues down to my level so I completely understood my options. Felt like I was talking to good friends who really cared.

reviews.title: brian vigil
reviews.description: As I write this I’m saddened and happy the lawyer I had at this firm did NOT do her due diligence and investigate my case. I was released from a probationary period from a job due to the fact I was having medical issues and on new medication that caused me to have lapse in judgment, cognitive impairment and the ability to think clearly. Although my employer had a taped admittance to changing some dates on paperwork, my new law firm contacted my doctors and independent medical professionals to confirm with a judge the confession was invalid. As soon as the county was going to impose a countersuit against me she backed down.  In my confession it was clearly stated multiple times I couldn’t remember specifics dates and times . I am now in arbitration to further my case with a positive result. My lawyer at this firm was very condescending and treated me as a criminal from the first time we talked, poor representation and unprofessional behavior from her .

reviews.title: Ronald Stitch
reviews.description: JML Law has been serving California for over 40 years, representing employees. Their pricing is competitive and reasonable.

reviews.title: Matthew Evans
reviews.description: I know you may be reading this review because you are in a situation that may need a lawyer. If you find that is the case (no pun intended), then I would recommend JML Law above all others.I wasn't too comfortable with a situation that occurred and thought the same as maybe you, should I or shouldn't I seek litigation? I can say after all is said and done, it was the right decision. My integrity and work ethic has always been a sense of pride for me. I believed that if you work hard, there would be a reward. For the last 20 years, that had been the case until now. When things went sideways in my life, I reached out to JML and wanted to know if I was "crazy" for wanting to fight once in my life. They assured me my situation was NOT the norm, and hard work does, in most cases, reap a reward. They agreed to take my case and were very understanding as well as compassionate. They made the process much more comfortable, and when it was time to relive my experiences, they were there with me reassuring me that I had done the right thing by hiring them. They were honest and realistic with me. Although stressful, my situation is now resolved.  I would rely on them and or refer anyone in the same position. You should, at a minimum, sit and discuss your circumstances with their team. If you are reading this, then you are questioning whether or not to move forward with lawyers. My suggestion is to stop reading this and give them a call.

reviews.title: Andrew Frisque
reviews.description: My situation was a bit complex.  After I dismissed my initial attorney and a second law firm agreed to help but then backed out, I thought I would have to handle my Work Comp case by myself - and that is NEVER a good idea.  Then, I found JML Law!  They took over and made sure I was taken care of.  I am very pleased with how they handled the case and interacted with me.  I am very pleased with the Settlement they negotiated!

reviews.title: Oscar Salazar
reviews.description: This firm without a doubt was the best legal representation I’ve ever had, from the very beginning to the time the case was settled, all these professionals who were involved from the paralegals to the lead attorney, they all did a fantastic job and I was very satisfied with the settlement I got.I would definitely refer this firm to any of my friend and relatives.This firm really separated itself from the others with the outstanding service.Oscar Salazar

reviews.title: Rosie Gonzaga
reviews.description: Mr. Joseph Lovretovich is a very knowledgeable attorney and one of the best! My experience and communication with him every time is extraordinary, practically instant. He is always on point and very professional. He is a remarkable advocate for anyone who needs representation. He and his entire team are welcoming and professional.

reviews.title: Kim Angle
reviews.description: JML law was extremely professional, thorough, and they took care of all of our needs. The folks working with us were not only professional but also were empathetic to what we as clients were going through. They also kept us informed throughout the waiting process. JML law gave us an opportunity at getting our lives back.

reviews.title: Tricia Miles
reviews.description: I recently consulted with Joseph Lovretovic/JML Law regarding an employment issue.  Joseph was professional, knowledgeable, and sincere.  He took the time to make sure I understood his advice, and that all of my follow up questions were completely answered. I sincerely appreciate the peace of mind that he has given to me, and I would highly recommend Joseph Lovretovic and his firm.

reviews.title: Jeremy Basich
reviews.description: JML Law and specifically Joe Lovretovich was an incredible resource and aided me in my wrongful termination suit. I would recommend he and his firm. They were credible and well versed in the legal matter at hand.

reviews.title: Heather Olson
reviews.description: My lawyers Christina Manalo and Eric Gruzen were very responsive and professional. All aspects of the financial outcome of my lawsuit were documented and made transparent. I am very happy with my result and I feel like justice was served! Thanks JML!

reviews.title: Patty Flores
reviews.description: Very unprofessional. I was in the middle of explaining the attorney my schedule availability and he hanged up on me. I called back and he rejected my call. I left a voicemail and waited a week for his call back. His last name is Rodriguez. The attorney never returned the phone call. Unprofessional and careless to say the least. Very dissapointed.Edit: After posting this review, I received an e-mail from the attorney, Rodriguez to let me know that they read this review and that they tried to reach me many times. Unfortunately, that is UNTRUE as I check my e-mails and voice mails constantly. This also proves that they are NOT honest.

reviews.title: Oneness Weekend
reviews.description: I was referred to this practice by a personal friend and within 24 hours of connecting me to the firm, I was able to speak with Joe directly. His professionalism and guidance were invaluable.I would definitely hire his firm  and/or refer him to family and friends.

reviews.title: Christine Economos
reviews.description: I can only speak from my experience with them, but they are great. Professional and they take negotiations to the next level.  I used them from 2011-2014, and again sought there help very recent regarding a serious situation. 5 stars all around.

reviews.title: Katie Masucci
reviews.description: JML helped me so much and were very patient with any questions I had. They were also incredibly professional, and I always heard back from them very promptly.

reviews.title: Melissa S
reviews.description: I would recommend. Nothing bad to say at all. They are very professional and communicative.

reviews.title: anderson alexander
reviews.description: Personable attorneys, God job guys

reviews.title: Anthony Martin
reviews.description: Very good attorneys

reviews.title: Kamryn Briski
reviews.description: Very professional and polite.

reviews.title: Richard Williams
reviews.description: Great attorneys
